data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Timbuktu.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Timbuktu, Mali

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Timbuktu to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary: On average, 75 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Timbuktu, Mali.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Timbuktu, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,525 believers in Timbuktu to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Saharan people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 681,700 people living in Timbuktu, Mali. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 677,176 lost in Timbuktu that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 4,525 believers find a person of peace today among the 677,176 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

location.name: Timbuktu
location.people_groups_list: Dogon, Bankan Tey, Songhai, Koyra, Moor, Tuareg, Tamasheq, Bozo, Sorogoye
